grad = Spin2(test_map.gradient(), angle=test_map.side_angle)
fig, ax = plt.subplots(2, 2, figsize=(16, 16))
grad.visualize(fig=fig, ax=ax.reshape(4), component_labels=(
    '$\\gamma_{1,x}$', '$\\gamma_{1,y}$', '$\\gamma_{2,x}$',
    '$\\gamma_{2,y}$'), colorbar=True)
fig.tight_layout()
fig.savefig('vector_gradient.png')
